name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Glenn WRIGHT, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Glenn WRIGHT, Appellant.

opinions.text:
OPINION OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM:
The Judgment of Sentence of the Court of Common Pleas of Philadelphia is affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Cynthia Severin-sen, Asst. Dist. Attys., Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
425 A.2d 740
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Glenn WRIGHT, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 19, 1981.
Decided Feb. 27, 1981.
Joseph Litt, Philadelphia (Court-appointed), for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Cynthia Severin-sen, Asst. Dist. Attys., Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C. J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY and KAUFFMAN, JJ.
